product_name: Nalgene Narrow-Mouth Polyethylene Bottle - 16 fl. oz.
long_description: The Nalgene 16 fl. oz. Narrow-Mouth polyethylene bottle is ideal for carrying water while walking and hiking. Made of rugged, semi-rigid, high-density polyethylene (HDPE). Narrow mouth makes it easy to pour. Loop-top keeps cap handy. Semi-transparent so you can see level of contents. Polyethylene is 100% BPA free.
short_description: The Nalgene 16 fl. oz. Narrow-Mouth polyethylene bottle is ideal for carrying water while walking and hiking.
